pages.text: Perhaps an ancient Egyptian priest once had this idea. Carving a wooden figure of the revered cat and imbuing it with magic, he created a powerful artifact that saved pyramids. $(br)Everyone knows how annoying creepers can be. And they are also terrified of cats. A wooden cat figure, infused with magic, is a potent idol capable of sending hordes of vile creepers fleeing in terror.

pages.title: Infusion
pages.text: Now your garden will be securely protected from creepers. Sponsored by a true cat-lover! $(l)Note$(): Pick up the figure by Shift+Right-clicking.

pages.title: Wooden Cat Figure
pages.text: Many wizards find this sight remarkably delightful.
